lead_paragraph: The Mets announced yesterday that tickets for potential postseason games at Shea Stadium would be available through an online lottery. Anyone who registers online, at mets.com or losmets.com, is eligible to purchase tickets for the division series, National League Championship Series or World Series. Registration closes Tuesday at midnight, and fans who are selected will be notified by Sept. 15.
